content: this flower is both beautiful and practical it includes a small flowerbed and a flower that is actually made up of five coasters arranged as petals when assembled it serves as a home decoration or you can spread it out during a tea gathering with family or friends adding warmth to a special occasion materials per 1 skein of friends cotton 8/6 colors 21 54 72 108 50 g / 1 75 oz = 105 m / 115 yds per skein crochet hook 3 mm d-3 scissors needle tape measure
